Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Expands the waiver of the residency requirement for the city attorney in the city of Mechanicville, Saratoga county
Summary: Expands the waiver of the residency requirement for the city attorney in the city of Mechanicville, Saratoga county.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to expanding the waiver of the residency requirement for the city attorney in the city of Mechanicville, Saratoga county
